title: Hardware & Coffee Ep. 2: PCB Design & Manufacturing [VIDEO]
content: Hardware & Coffee Ep. 2: PCB Design & Manufacturing [VIDEO] Check out the new part of our Hardware & Coffee video series. It is all about PCB design and manufacturing. We hope that these videos will help the creators in hardware development process:
